type.description:
[Data Type][data_types]

A [String][string] used to determine the type of container to use for the inventory of a power that uses the [Inventory (Power Type)](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/data_types/container_type).

!!!	note

	Not to be confused with the [Inventory Type (Data Type)][inventory_type]
